tasks.label: Build Docker Image (with DKP)
tasks.command: sudo DOCKER_BUILDKIT=1 docker build --ssh default=${SSH_AUTH_SOCK} --build-arg MAKE_JOBS=$nproc --secret id=xerpi_gist,src=secret/xerpi_gist.txt -t vita2hos-dev .

tasks.label: Build Docker Image (without DKP)
tasks.command: sudo DOCKER_BUILDKIT=1 docker build --ssh default=${SSH_AUTH_SOCK} --build-arg MAKE_JOBS=$nproc --build-arg INSTALL_DKP_PACKAGES=0 --secret id=xerpi_gist,src=secret/xerpi_gist.txt -t vita2hos-dev .
